title: Includes certain rehabilitation hospitals within the definition of inpatient care services for purposes of providing child health insurance plan coverage
summary: Includes certain facilities treated as excluded physical medicine rehabilitation hospitals within the definition of inpatient care services for purposes of providing child health insurance plan coverage.
